description: Creative Enzymes is a leading biotech company specialized in enzyme expression, purification, stabilization and screening. We are devoted into enzyme discovery to serve the industrial, health, and therapeutic areas. For product or process development, it is often critical to identify the target enzyme of an inhibitor, the natural biocatalyst of a certain reaction, or the most active enzyme that acts on a substrate. We are proud to present the screening services targeted at enzyme identification based on known substrates or inhibitors.
name: Enzyme Screening Against Substrates
